As drama is an area of interest to [ ], I've attached the following links which provide a good insight into our fantastic drama program:
A behind the scenes video log of last year’s school production of Beauty and the Beast; and This fun pop up performance of Beauty and the Beast in the Commonwealth Bank building in the city.
Details of our Drama Department are on our website and as theatre is an area of interest to you, we would be certain to include a visit to our Black Box Theatre when you come for a tour.
There is an after-school Year 7 Drama Club and from Year 8, there is a Middle School Drama ensemble. Our Head of Drama, Jane Simmons, is a well-known improvisation coach and there are great opportunities for students to participate in inter-school improvisation competitions.
In the meantime, please see the links to videos and information below that give you an insight into our Middle School culture:
This video - Middle School Matters - has interviews with both staff and students; This video shows our Head of Middle School, Mr David Smith, speaking about our Middle School philosophy and supportive learning culture; and Find further Middle School information on our website.
You can keep up-to-date with what’s happening at the School via our Facebook page and you can view more videos on our official YouTube channel.
If I can be of further assistance, please feel free to contact me directly on 9286 9552.
Regards
